segments.text: My eyes keep going to the children near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That little boy is truly an acrobat on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks so unstable, practically tipping over already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up into the "COOKIE JAR," which is quite an ambitious climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in his other hand, probably to load up on his sweet treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is just waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on the plan, a willing accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their quiet giggles, though the scene is silent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman has no idea what's happening just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool holds steady for a little while longer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a charming display of childhood cunning.
segments.speaker: PAR
